New Records: David Miller scored 59 runs off 51 balls and was named Player of the Match
Key Match Events: The match went into the 19th over with South Africa needing 4 wickets to win
Sybrand Engelbrecht scored 40 runs for Netherlands as the top scorer
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and elected to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: David Miller was named Player of the Match after his crucial innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 16th match in Group D of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
The venue was Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
